title: Stories about Death
main_text:
“I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens.” Woody Allen

An Outpost of Progress by Joseph Conrad

Alyosa the Pot by Leo Tolstoy

At the Bay by Katherine Mansfield

An Imaginative Woman by Thomas Hardy

A Haunted House by Virginia Woolf

The Pupil by Henry James

The Dance of Death by Gustave Flaubert

A Terribly Strange Bed by Wilkie Collins

God See's Truth, but Waits by Leo Tolstoy

The Three Strangers by Thomas Hardy

How Much Land Does a Man Need? by Leo Tolstoy

The Death of Oliver Becaille by Emile Zola
